name: Jerry Reinsdorf
description:
In recent weeks, a new popular profile emerged on JONJ. No, it's not a Hollywood starlet or a sports figure... Well, it actually is a sports figure, but not one you might think.

That profile? Jerry Krause, the one-time GM of the Chicago Bulls of the NBA.

You see, this is being written in the middle of the Coronavirus pandemic, with athletics extinguished throughout the globe. With nothing to turn to, sports fans tune to whatever is available. They do so in droves, be it the teleconference NFL draft or "The Last Dance", the ten-hour documentary dealing with the Bulls final championship season of 1997-98. And prominent in that documentary is Krause, the much-maligned GM despised and ridiculed by Michael Jordan, despite building that basketball dynasty.

Krause cannot really defend himself in the documentary, because he has been dead for three years. Still, his presence in old interviews leads sports fans to flock to our website and his profile (linked below), which we wrote six years ago.

Also prominent in the documentary? Jerry Reinsdorf, who owns the Bulls (as well as the Chicago White Sox). He is Jewish as well.

Who knows, maybe this profile will become popular too.
